translations: 狡猾的，逃避的；善于骗人的；躲闪的

sentences.sentence: I can't play—I've got a dodgy knee.
sentences.translation: 我不能玩了—我的膝盖出了毛病。

sentences.sentence: If you get into any dodgy situations, call me.
sentences.translation: 如果你遇上什么难事，给我打电话。

sentences.sentence: I don't want to get involved in anything dodgy.
sentences.translation: 我不想牵连进任何欺骗勾当。
